page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content:
The Eastern Area of the twelve kilometre square block is mainly hilly farmland with some woodland and some residential development.
There is little industry but the residential land is covered by all sorts of housing. Shopping facilities include post offices, small supermarkets and newsagents. There are three schools and only one church. Recreational facilities are poor but there are several private sports facilities.
The farmland is predominantly cultivated and used mainly for the keeping of cattle. Some corn is grown and there is one turkey farm. The woodland is dense and deciduous.
The area contains few main roads but
